comment:
Hello. I have tried Apify and like it so far. However, I want a way to scrape the time codes in a video's description. For example, THIS video's description has the following time codes:

0:00 - Introduction
0:29 - Sign up
1:00 - Scraper Configuration
2:11 - Dataset
2:25 - Apify Store
2:43 - Check out our other tutorials!

Thank you for your time, and thank you to the developers!
- David
